channel.title: Special bar doesn't appear
channel.description:
Hi guys, I was wanting to add a new special to my server (a fixed device special) when I noticed there was no spec bar. I added 6082 (ID for fixed device) as a case in special.java, and it still does not appear. I try my other client and it appears. How can I make it so on my other client the special bar appears aswell? Because the special bar on the client I used does not appear for ANY weapon.
I'm willing to rep++ someone if they help me. All help is appreciated, thanks :)

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

well this is czar’s sendweapon void

public void SendWeapon(int Weapon, String WeaponName) { String WeaponName2 = WeaponName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); 
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Iron", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Steel", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Black", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Mithril", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Adamant", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Rune", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Granite", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Dragon", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.replaceAll("Crystal", "");
    WeaponName2 = WeaponName2.trim();
    if (WeaponName.equals("Unarmed") || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 5855); // punch, kick, block
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 5857);
    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("whip")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); // flick, lash, deflect
        sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);
    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("bow")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); // accurate, rapid, longrange
        sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);
    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("Bow")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); // accurate, rapid, longrange
        sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);
    } else if (WeaponName.startsWith("crystal_bow")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); // accurate, rapid, longrange
        sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);
    } else if (WeaponName.startsWith("seercull")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); // accurate, rapid, longrange
        sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);
    } else if (WeaponName.startsWith("Staff")
            || WeaponName.endsWith("staff")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 328); // spike, impale, smash, block
        sendFrame246(329, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 331);
    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("combat")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 328); // spike, impale, smash, block
        sendFrame246(329, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 331);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("dart")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 4446); // accurate, rapid, longrange
        sendFrame246(4447, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 4449);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("dagger")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 2276); // stab, lunge, slash, block
        sendFrame246(2277, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 2279);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("pickaxe")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 5570); // spike, impale, smash, block
        sendFrame246(5571, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 5573);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("axe")
            || WeaponName2.startsWith("battleaxe")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 1698); // chop, hack, smash, block
        sendFrame246(1699, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1701);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("halberd")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 8460); // jab, swipe, fend
        sendFrame246(8461, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 8463);
    } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("spear")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 4679); // lunge, swipe, pound, block
        sendFrame246(4680, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 4682);
    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("claws")) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 7762); // chop, slash, lunge, block
        sendFrame246(7763, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 7764);
    } else {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // chop, slash, lunge, block
        sendFrame246(2424, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 2426);
    }
}</blockquote>

and sure no problem

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Compare them from each client.

@recker450’s method; That only changes the interface for the attack styles. The special bar is added according to the item ID/name, not the interface.[/quote]
true but will also supply the interface unless you use lin’s interface maker and add the spec bar there

Read full topic

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:360901”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=457191.msg3346137#msg3346137 date=1284855733]
Please show your code.

Though, if it works on one client, and not the other, it should have something to do with the sendFrame171 method, (I believe it’s sendFrame171)
[/quote]Well I dont have any code, and to recker450, it didn’t work
And vain, Ill check my sendframe171 method.
EDIT:
heres my 171 method.

public void sendFrame171(int MainFrame, int SubFrame) { outStream.createFrame(171); outStream.writeByte(MainFrame); outStream.writeWord(SubFrame); flushOutStream(); }[/quote]

well have you messed around with this?
i know itll replace the interface but itll have an spec bar

    } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("Device") || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6082) {
        setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // chop, slash, lunge, block
        sendFrame246(2424, 200, Weapon);
        sendFrame126(WeaponName, 2426);

in my server some interfaces doesnt have the spec bar so if you replace the interface itll give an spec bar

Read full topic

heres my 171 method.

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

well there is one way…itll replace the attack types of the device
find this

public void SendWeapon(int Weapon, String WeaponName) {

find something like this that has an spec bar

} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("whip")) { setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); // flick, lash, deflect sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon); sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);
and under it add this
} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("device")) { setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); // flick, lash, deflect sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon); sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);

there your spec bar should have an special bar
and a fixed device weapon would be cool for an server like an boozoka

Read full topic
